definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: The corn borer is a cosmopolitau and seriously injured insect pests of corn in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 玉米鑽心蟲是四川玉米上的主要害蟲，發生普遍。

sentences.english: There's a grub that kills them by boring into the flower.
sentences.chinese: 有一種鑽心蟲，鑽進一條去，花就死了。
